citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am on
26-Jun-19.
The licensee stated by phone that no one would be available for an inspection within 30 minutes from the time of
inspector's arrival at the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am on
26-Jun-19.
 The licensee stated by phone that no one would be available for an inspection within 30 minutes from the time of
inspector's arrival at the facility.
